description: {"blocks":[{"key":"908qg","text":"Protocol for decontamination of tooth roots and petrous bone cores from archaeological human remains for reduction of surface contaminations and increase of endogenous DNA prior to DNA extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"5q82","text":"Please read the general guidelines for working in the Ancient DNA protocol collection â€“ University of Tartu, Institute of Genomics.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ermvn","text":"Clean drill hood and table bench surfaces with DNA Exitus and rinse with water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4krti","text":"Set up 100 ml beaker decontamination station:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4l5dn","text":"1x NaOCl (bleach, 6% v/v)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jtnu","text":"1x MilliQ water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rul0","text":"1x Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"16i4j","text":"Place toothbrush and tweezers in bleach.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3o6h","text":"Prepare two 50 ml tubes per sample, label with sample ID and B for bleach and E for ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avqig","text":"Add around   NaOCl (bleach, 6% v/v) to each B tube (sample needs to be submerged).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c25f2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"818CB6807E0D11ECA2ED4BDC0F35ABDC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1nlpa","text":"Add around   ethanol (70%) to each E tube (sample needs to be submerged).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f96ug","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"841D25607E0D11ECA2ED4BDC0F35ABDC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cisuu","text":"Place paper towels on a drying rack (e.g. upside-down multi-rack lid) and tape in place. Label with sample IDs. Place in the hood on a piece of aluminum foil and UV the rack in the drill hood while decontaminating samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ivei","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ortl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1pov0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3b97h","text":"Steps 10.1-10.3 only apply if the samples is visibly dirty.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"svg5","text":"Place samples in NaOCl (B tube) for   and shake while incubating.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ih9l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"068721007E0811EC8425C90485ED3221","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ec46","text":"Pour excess NaOCl down the sink with normal faucet running to dilute the bleach, careful not to drop the samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gons","text":"Rinse with MilliQ water 3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bfur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dss6e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ihg2","text":"Shake, pour out excess water, and place sample in ethanol for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6bn9j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"4ADCB8607E0811ECA2ED4BDC0F35ABDC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d53g3","text":"Wash down sink with normal facet to dilute/remove remaining bleach in the drain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"64p1c","text":"Pour out excess ethanol from tubes into the sink and place back into the rack. Rinse with normal faucet water when finished.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1b9r","text":"In the hood, place paper towels in front of the rack for catching excess ethanol. One at a time, remove as much ethanol as possible before placing samples onto the square with the corresponding sample ID on drying rack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1dplp","text":"Leave UV on while allowing the samples to dry at least for   or   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"brsts","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"AB94DA207E0811ECA2ED4BDC0F35ABDC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"02DEBD007E0911ECA2ED4BDC0F35ABDC","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjkgb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80b63","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9crpp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"55qfr","text":"Either continue on the same day with the extraction protocol or stop here:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8ihoi","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6f299","text":"To continue, see with protocol \"ancient DNA extraction (chunk samples/high volume)\".","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"drk42","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1bpba","text":"To stop, prepare weighing boats (small), one for each sample, and label with sample ID. Tare scale with small weighing boat labeled with the sample number, place tooth/petrous core on and record weight. Place sample in a respective tube (5 ml tube for \u003c250 mg; 15 ml tube for \u003e250 mg).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dghj4","text":"Put out one medium weighing boat for each sample and label it in the corner.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1godf","text":"Take sample to be used for extraction and place in weighing boat labeled with sample ID.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fataa","text":"Remove surface dirt gently from the sample using the toothbrush soaked in NaOCl. Be careful with scrubbing to not spray bleach/dirt onto yourself or other samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnk6j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"baj7r","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f04vl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1j4fb","text":"Change gloves during the Decontamination steps whenever they get dirty or wet.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"75l2k","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csqrg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v0vj","text":"NaOCl (bleach) solution (6%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnlg0","text":"- H290 May be corrosive to metals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvqr0","text":"- H314 Causes severe skin burns and eye damage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rhem","text":"- H411 Toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvi7c","text":"- EUH206 Warning! Do not use together with other products. May release dangerous gases (chlorine). Remove from surface after recommended incubation time with water-soaked tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l8c7","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7cdkh","text":"DNA ExitusPlus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tsim","text":"H319 Causes serious eye irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"confb","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bmfpo","text":"Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pap7","text":"- H225 Highly flammable liquid and vapor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ikeo","text":"- H319 Causes serious eye irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21n4v","text":"      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":1,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bpeg0","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hmvv","text":"UV radiation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e125c","text":"- UV radiation can damage eyes and can be carcinogenic in contact with skin. Do not look directly at unshielded UV radiation. Do not expose unprotected skin to UV radiation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1oprh","text":"- UV emitters generate ozone during operation. Use only in ventilated rooms.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d89ku","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B47594BA901E11EDA8680A58A9FEAC02","height":65,"id":360200,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92kbjfsp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92ibjfsp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k92jbjfsp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92hbjfsp.webp","width":65}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B4759635901E11EDA8680A58A9FEAC02","height":65,"id":360206,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92sbjfsp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92qbjfsp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k92rbjfsp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92nbjfsp.webp","width":65}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B4759785901E11EDA8680A58A9FEAC02","height":67,"id":360210,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92wbjfsp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92ubjfsp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k92vbjfsp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92tbjfsp.webp","width":67}},"3":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B4759AEE901E11EDA8680A58A9FEAC02","height":67,"id":360214,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k924bjfsp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92ybjfsp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k923bjfsp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k92xbjfsp.webp","width":67}},"4":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B4758EB8901E11EDA8680A58A9FEAC02","height":67,"id":360222,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k93cbjfsp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k928bjfsp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k93bbjfsp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k927bjfsp.webp","width":67}},"5":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B47590D7901E11EDA8680A58A9FEAC02","height":63,"id":360231,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k93kbjfsp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k93hbjfsp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k93jbjfsp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k93gbjfsp.webp","width":66}},"6":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B47592C3901E11EDA8680A58A9FEAC02","height":59,"id":360239,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k93ubjfsp.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k93rbjfsp.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k93tbjfsp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k93pbjfsp.webp","width":81}}}}
